data.text:
We‚Äôve been regular visitors since 2009 and it honestly feels like we‚Äôre going to our second home. We immediately go into total relax mode when we get our complimentary pick up at Sharm airport knowing how well we‚Äôre going to be looked after. The complimentary pick up is available to everyone, just email the hotel a week before your arrival with flight details. It‚Äôs only a short 10mins transfer.

It‚Äôs always been a great hotel but the improvements we‚Äôve seen over the years have been incredible. I don‚Äôt think the owner/ senior management will ever rest on their laurels! The food is exceptional and there are plenty of bars and snack areas to suit everyone‚Äôs taste. 

It was really good to see a lot more English people having their first visit & raving about the hotel. Think this is probably down to the hotel working with EasyJet to offer package holidays. Just a shame that EasyJet don‚Äôt fly from any Scottish airport yet!

The jewel in the crown at the Sultan Gardens is, and always has been, the staff & a number of them have become our friends over the years. They are super friendly but treat you with the utmost respect. From the gardeners to housekeeping, lifeguards, bar staff, kitchen staff, waiting staff & chefs they will meet you with a warm smile and will be willing to go that extra mile to make your holiday unforgettable. As one first time guest said ‚Äú They know what you want before you even know it yourself‚Äù Feedback doesn‚Äôt get any better than that. 

A couple of photos af Adham & Mohammed who looked after us so well at North 38 pool

Next visit already booked!
Louise & Fiona
data.title: Super Sultan

data.text: It punches above its weight. Excellent staff in all resort, customer friendly. Special note to our restaurant manger Lofty for making sure we were always satisfied. Good reef and beach (sea side has particular attention to safety with several floting life bouy at sea) Good selection of extra activities/services. We loved the speed boat excursion.We are definetly coming back.
data.title: It punches above its weight

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Fabio,

Warmest Greetings from Sultan Gardens Resort,
Thank you for choosing the Sultan Gardens Resort and for the five-star review. 
We are thrilled to know we met all your expectations, and you had a great stay. 

Best regards, 
Sultan Gardens Team
owner_response.author: Guest  Relation

data.text:
Fantastic 10 day break away from wet and miserable UK.
Hotel facilities superb, from pools, beach, immaculate gardens, SPA, entertainment üëå 
Staff mainly excellent..friendly, welcoming and extremely hard working.
Fantastic choice of food, to suit range of tastes. Special themes through out.  
Activities...we loved snorkeling off hotel pier.  Boat trip to nature reserve ok.  Wife had scuba diving experience with Eagle Divers..fab instructor.  Be wary of sales rep.
Brilliant safari in desert organised through hotel.  Definitely tip the staff.  Negotiate everything!  Lots of Russian guests who have there own behaviours!
Thank you Lofty and restaurant team, and special mention to Mohamed at N38 pool.
data.title: Warmed up and relaxed in luxury setting

owner_response.author: Guest  Relation

data.text:
Staff, services, food, apartment etc were exceptional. We only spent 3 nights at SG but it felt like paradise. Special shoutouts to:

- Mohammed the taxi guy in reception who organized us an excellent taxi service to old market and back.

- Abdullah the taxi driver for giving us private tour around Sharm El Sheikh. 

- Lofty and Tatty in the food restaurant for looking after us and making sure our glasses and cups were never empty

- Ahmed for keeping our room spotless

- Hotel guest service for a lovely suprise gift

- Mohammed aka Da Vinci for explaining arabic grammar and inking temporary tattoos

- SPA team for excellent massage and beauty treatments.

- Hussien the canvas guy, make sure to checkout the ‚Äòetsy‚Äô art collection. He will do good deals. 

Keep up the good work everyone. We are planning to come back soon with the little ones.

Andris and Velta
data.title: Fantastic easter break

Sultan Gardens Team
